title: 111 - Goodbye, Carlito
description: On today's show, the guys discuss a man who stowed away on a plane and traveled 11 hours from South Africa to London, Digs is back from the Covid Cave and gives a rundown on all the different things he watched during his quarantine, and the guys rifle through a stacked Pod FOD that includes Connor having to do an Oklahoma drill against Packers RB AJ Dillon once the season is over, which game shows each of the guys think they'd have a realistic shot at winning, The Rock being named the most likable man in the world, Liam Neeson pissing his pants, Mitt thinking Tony is a "false" when it comes to snowboarding, and much more.
dc:creator: The Pod
itunes:summary: On today's show, the guys discuss a man who stowed away on a plane and traveled 11 hours from South Africa to London, Digs is back from the Covid Cave and gives a rundown on all the different things he watched during his quarantine, and the guys rifle through a stacked Pod FOD that includes Connor having to do an Oklahoma drill against Packers RB AJ Dillon once the season is over, which game shows each of the guys think they'd have a realistic shot at winning, The Rock being named the most likable man in the world, Liam Neeson pissing his pants, Mitt thinking Tony is a "false" when it comes to snowboarding, and much more.
